name: Arend
description:
Arend is a 2.5D Role-playing game where the main character, the Knight, is aware he is living inside a videogame. In this first prototype you will play the prelude of the game, where no NPC has gained consciousness yet. We would like to gather feedback regarding design aspects such as skills, quests and combat. We would also like to receive feedback regarding other more technical aspects.

Please leave a comment here or alternatively through the following google form https://forms.gle/NphrzoRYiygpDjoB7
